title: He’s Doing The Job For Now
itunes:title: He’s Doing The Job For Now
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 47 year old divorced female and I am in need of advice. I am in management at my company and I own two properties and a boat. I have two nice cars and I am very active in my community with charities and civic organizations. After I got a divorce I vowed to live my life on my own terms and treat men as an option not a necessity.........................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
